search.enter-to-search-web: Press enter t' search th' web

config.heading: Ye Configuration Options
config.backup-note: It be recommend t' make a backup o' yer configuration before makin' changes.
config.reset-config-msg-l1: This will remove all user settin's from local storage, but won't effect yer 'conf.yml' file.
config.reset-config-msg-l2: ye should first backup any changes ye've made locally, if ye want t' use them in th' future.
config.reset-config-msg-l3: be ye sure ye want t' proceed?
config.data-copied-msg: Config has been copied t' clipboardd
config.css-note-l1: ye will need t' refresh th' page fer yer changes t' take effect.
config.css-note-l2: Styles overrides be only stored locally, so it be recommended t' make a copy o' yer CSS.
config.css-note-l3: To remove all custom styles, delete th' contents and hit Save Changes

updates.unsupported-version-l1: You are using a ye' old version of Dashy
updates.unsupported-version-l2: For th' best experience, and recent security patches, please update to

theme-maker.copied-toast: Theme data for {theme} copied t' ye clipboard

config-editor.success-msg-disk: Th' config file written to disk successfully
config-editor.success-msg-local: Ye local changes were successfully saved
config-editor.success-note-l2: This may take up t' a minute.
config-editor.success-note-l3: ye will need t' refresh th' page fer changes t' take effect.
config-editor.error-msg-bad-json: Error in ye JSON, possibly malformed
config-editor.not-admin-note: ye cannot write changed t' disk, because ye be not logged in as an admin

app-rebuild.title: Rebuild Application
app-rebuild.rebuild-note-l1: A rebuild be required fer changes written t' th' conf.yml file t' take effect.
app-rebuild.rebuild-note-l2: This should happen automatically, but if it hasn't, ye can manually trigger it here.
app-rebuild.rebuild-note-l3: This be not required fer modifications stored locally.
app-rebuild.error-permission: ye dern't have permission t' trigger this action
app-rebuild.reload-note: A page reload be now required fer changes t' take effect

cloud-sync.intro-l1: Cloud backup and restore be an optional feature, that enables ye t' upload yer config t' th' internet, and then restore it on any other device or instance o' Dashy.
cloud-sync.intro-l2: All data be fully end-t'-end encrypted with AES, usin' yer password as th' key.
cloud-sync.intro-l3: For more info, please see th'
cloud-sync.backup-id-note: This be used t' restore from backups later. So keep it, along with yer password somewhere safe.
cloud-sync.backup-error-password: Incorrect password. Walk the plank! Please enter yer current password.
